exceptions.exn: The reference H_ex_series was not found in the current environment.
The reference H_is_series was not found in the current environment.
In environment a : nat -> R X : (nat -> ?V) -> Prop x : R H0 : is_series a x Unable to unify "a 0%nat + Series (fun k : nat => a (S k))" with "Series a".

original: intros a H_ex_series. unfold ex_series in H_ex_series. destruct H_ex_series as [l H_is_series]. rewrite (is_series_unique a l H_is_series). reflexivity.
